comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: NYT of July 26, 1931, has his obituary (requies subscription): select.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=F20816FB3C5F1B72... "H. Otto Wittpenn, 58 years old, former naval officer of the Port of New York under the Wilson Administration and several times Mayor of Jersey City, died last night at his home, Castle Point, Hoboken, N.J. " The obituary has a picture which is a good match.

comment.author: 35014516@N03
comment._content: swanq: Thanks for the additional information about Wittpenn.  We will include some of it next time we update the description.
